00042 enum Quests

00050       QUEST_RESCUE_MARIA,

00052       QUEST_HELD_IN_ALMA,

00054 
00055       QUEST_ARMY_FARM, // 10
00056       QUEST_FIND_SCIENTIST,
00057       QUEST_DELIVER_VIDEO_CAMERA,
00058       QUEST_BLOODCATS,
00059       QUEST_FIND_HERMIT,
00060       QUEST_CREATURES,
00061       QUEST_CHOPPER_PILOT,

00071 /*
00072 // The first quest is mandatory. Player must find Miguel and deliver letter to him. The tough
00073 // part is finding him. Miguel is UNDERGROUND in EAST OMERTA. Only by talking to Miguel's right
00074 // hand man will the player be delivered to this hideout. This hideout will also serve as the
00075 // player's HQ and inventory stash.
00076 #define     QUEST_DELIVER_LETTER          0
00077 
00078 
00079 // This quest is triggered by Miguel. Player can liberate route from either SAN MONA or
00080 // Drassen. Result allows player to hire on 2 of Miguel's guys.
00081 #define QUEST_FOOD_ROUTE                        1
00082 
00083 // terrorist quests: 3 out of possible 6 per game - randomized which 3 and where. The 
00084 // Bounty Hunter will either appear in CAMBRIA or ALMA. He'll give a diskette with files
00085 // on three of these terrorists. (we won't give files for all six since it may confuse
00086 // player if ony 3 of them exist). The files will contain photographs. The terrorists will go
00087 // by aliases and the photographs will be hard to tell if the NPC is really a terrorist. 
00088 // Bounty Hunter will give reward ($$$ CASH $$$) for proof of each death. 
00089 #define QUEST_KILL_TERRORISTS                   2
00090 #define QUEST_KILL_IMPOSTER               3
00091 #define QUEST_KILL_TERRORIST3       4
00092 #define QUEST_KILL_TERRORIST4       5
00093 #define QUEST_KILL_TERRORIST5       6
00094 #define     QUEST_KILL_TERRORIST6         7
00095 
00096 // While there'll always be one arms dealer in SAN MONA, there'll be a second one
00097 // randomized in the outskirts of either: GRUMM, BARLINETTA or ESTONI. Only way player
00098 // will know where to look will be to talk to certain town residents.
00099 #define QUEST_FIND_ARMSDEALER       8
00100 
00101 
00102 // CAMBRIA has 4 medical doctors, supplies and facilities
00103 #define QUEST_MEDICAL_FACILITY      9           // Cambria
00104 
00105 
00106 // A hermit will exist in each game, but in a different location. The player can try to 
00107 // talk to him, but he won't admit much. If the player threatens him, he gets his pet blood
00108 // cats to attack the player. However, if the player talks to the hermit's brother, the brother
00109 // will give valuable info (a code phrase) to the player that will allow the hermit to talk
00110 // to the player, telling him about using creature blood when in the mines and giving him a 
00111 // vile - good enough for 3 mercs.
00112 #define QUEST_FIND_HERMIT                       10
00113 
00114 
00115 // SAN MONA is a tough town. Player will find it tough to get any info out of any residents 
00116 // because they won't trust the player's mercs. SAN MONA doesn't have it as tough as any of
00117 // the other towns - the local authorities (Queen's police) is as corrupt as the residents
00118 // and to protect themselves they don't deal with outsiders. All residents will more or less
00119 // let the player know that unless the word comes down from the top dude, no one will speak
00120 // or deal with them. So, the player must seek out the top dude who'll want the player to 
00121 // fight his strongest bodyguard (hand to hand or knife). 
00122 #define QUEST_SAN_MONA_FIGHT        11
00123 
00124 
00125 
00126 // Need a way to bring a kid giving us something into the picture.
00127 
00128 
00129 // Micky returns in JA2 but with a new occupation. 
00130 #define QUEST_FIND_MICKY                        12
00131 
00132 
00133 
00134 #define QUEST_FREE_PRISONERS        13          // Tixa
00135 
00136 #define QUEST_FIND_SCIENTIST        14
00137 
00138 
00139 #define QUEST_KILL_BUGS                         15    // Queen bug - randomized location?
00140 
00141 // 
00142 #define QUEST_ESCAPE_MEDUNA               16
00143 
00144 // Arulco farmer in F11 (Juan Erizia) is suspected of harboring a weapons cache in support
00145 // of the Queen's forces. Player finds out about him in Cambria via conversation with a non
00146 // family member (many of Cambria's residents are related/Erizias). So, player can go 
00147 // investigate. F11 must be liberated and Juan Erizia must still be alive. We randomize
00148 // between QUEST_WEAPON_FARM and QUEST_SICK_WIFE. Player goes to talk to Juan. If he arrives
00149 // during nighttime, there won't be too many cousins hanging around, but player has to be
00150 // careful 
00151 //any attempt to 
00152 // investigate will awaken everyone, a battle will ensue.
00153 
00154 
00155 // Player finds out through conversation in Cambria that Juan suspected of harboring weapons
00156 // cache.
00157 
00158 // Juan is very protective of his farm.
00159 // Juan has 3 sons, 4 nephews and a sick wife.
00160 // Juan refuses attempts to inspect his farm unless his brother has arranged it.
00161 // Brother Emile is in Cambria.
00162 // Player can investigate at night as long as he doesn't wake anyone.
00163 // If player has talked to Emile, Juan will give him permission to investigate everywhere
00164 // except his bedroom (citing a sick wife).
00165 
00166 
00167 
00168 
00169 #define QUEST_WEAPON_FARM                       17
00170 
00171 #define QUEST_SICK_WIFE                         18
00172 
00173 
00174 // Queen has removed a national & historic treasure from the ruins of Chitzena. It is 
00175 // believed a wealthy supporter of the Queen purchased the item and that it is located in
00176 // his home in Balime. Returning the treasure to Chitzena boosts loyalty points.
00177 #define QUEST_RUIN_ARTIFACT               19
00178 
00179 
00180 // In Cambria, there is a serial killer on the loose, attacking miners. This will only
00181 // start to happen once player has control over the city & mine. It affects the number
00182 // of residents willing to work in the mines (loyalty basically).
00183 #define QUEST_MURDERER                          20
00184 
00185 // Find the chopper pilot near Drassen(?) and get him to work for you.
00186 #define QUEST_CHOPPER_PILOT               21
00187 
00188 #define     QUEST_KILL_DEIDRANNA          29    // Meduna
00189 
00190 
00191 
00192 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00193 */
00194
